ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Bad Girls
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sela learns how the Reavers are being controlled and tracks down Baba Yaga who is intent on using the crown to finish off the Dark One once and for all but will she convince Baba Yaga to postpone her revenge and turn coat against the other bad girls or will she too fall victim to the powers of the crown. Donâ€™t miss the baddest series in the history of Grimm Fairy Tales.
